desc: Charming gifts, clothing, and craft supplies inspired by the vintage look of the 1940's and 50's. Handmade baby items, earrings, aprons, etc. as well as patterns, fabrics, and tatting supplies so you can make your own delightful vintage styled items.

layout.text: Vintage Inspired Gifts and Craft Supplies
You'll find the perfect gifts for the quilter, crafter or vintage lover in your life. Handmade items, repurposed vintage linens, recycled wool yarns, aprons, craft kits, baby gifts, and more!
